extension.name: JoomSpirit Slider
extension.author: JoomSpirit
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 2 or later
extension.description:
This free module allows you to display a responsive slideshow. Read "How to use" here.
It's created and distributed by JoomSpirit : the best place to find a beautiful template.

field.name: load_jquery
field.label: Enable jQuery 1.10.1 ?
field.description: Joomla 3.X load already Jquery so I recommend to disable this option to prevent any conflict. Turn on or off included jQuery version 1.10.1

field.name: pauseOnHover
field.label: Pause on hover
field.description: Pause the slideshow when hovering over slider, then resume when no longer hovering

field.name: initDelay
field.label: Initialisation delay
field.description: Set an initialization delay, in milliseconds

field.name: kenburns
field.label: Kenburn effect (zoom)
field.description: It's a CSS3 animation : work only in browsers that support CSS3 animations

field.name: rotate_on_scroll
field.label: Rotation on scroll
field.description: It's a jQuery animation with the script Skrollr : the slideshow rotate when you scroll down

field.name: fade_text_on_scroll
field.label: Fade text on scroll
field.description: It's a jQuery animation with the script Skrollr : the text disappear when the slideshow is on the top and you scroll down

field.name: load_skrollr
field.label: Load Skrollr if you have enabled the previous effects (rotate slideshow or fade text on scroll)
field.description: Disable this option only if your template load already the script Skrollr.js

field.name: height_slideshow_desktop
field.label: Height fluid or fixed
field.description: If you choose Fluid, the image is never cropped and with the maximum width available. So the height depend of the available width. If you choose Height Fixed, the width is the maximum available in your module position and the height if fixed. So the image will be cropped in height or in width. That depend of the size of your images.
field.option: Height fixed in % of the viewport (image cropped)

field.name: height_slideshow_desktop_percentage
field.label: If height fixed in % of viewport
For Tablets ( screen width between 980 and 768 pixels )

field.name: height_slideshow_tablet
field.label: Height fluid or fixed
field.description: If you choose Fluid, the image is never cropped and with the maximum width available. So the height depend of the available width. If you choose Height Fixed, the width is the maximum available in your module position and the height if fixed. So the image will be cropped in height or in width. That depend of the size of your images.
field.option: Height fixed in % of the viewport (image cropped)

field.name: height_slideshow_tablet_percentage
field.label: If height fixed in % of viewport

field.name: height_slideshow_phone
field.label: Height fluid or fixed
field.description: If you choose Fluid, the image is never cropped and with the maximum width available. So the height depend of the available width. If you choose Height Fixed, the width is the maximum available in your module position and the height if fixed. So the image will be cropped in height or in width. That depend of the size of your images.
field.option: Height fixed in % of the viewport (image cropped)

field.name: height_slideshow_phone_percentage
field.label: If height fixed in % of viewport

field.name: slide_theme
field.label: Slideshow theme
field.description: Slide theme display is ideal for slide transition. Choose Custom theme if you want use the options below.

field.name: transition
field.label: Transition
field.description: Choose whether the slider will fade or slide between slides

field.name: bg_color
field.label: Background color of the slideshow (important for fade transition)
field.description: Enter 'transparent' or the hexadecimal code color : default : #ffffff

field.name: animSpeed
field.label: Animation speed (ms)
field.description: Speed of the transition (in ms). Default : 2000

field.name: pauseTime
field.label: Pause time (ms)
field.description: How long each slide is show (in ms). Default : 6500

field.name: shadow_top_image
field.label: Shadow on the top of each image

field.name: shadow_bottom_image
field.label: Shadow on the bottom of each image

field.name: theme_shadow
field.label: Shadow around the slideshow
field.description: If you choose Large shadow , a margin of 10 pixels will be around the slideshow

field.name: controlNav
field.label: Control nav
field.description: Create navigation for paging control of each slide ?

field.name: colorNav
field.label: Color of non active button
field.description: Choose 'dark' on a light background or 'light' on a dark background

field.name: transparency_bg_text
field.label: Transparency of your background text
field.description: Don't work with IE8- except with full transparency

field.name: bg_color_text_ie
field.label: Optionnal background color specially for IE8-
field.description: The transparency don't work with IE8-, so you can have a problem of readibility with your background color choice. With this option you can choose a specific background color only for IE8-

field.name: position_text
field.label: Position of your text
field.description: It's the general position. You can choose a specific position for each image in the Image section

field.name: max_width
field.label: Maximum width for your text in px

field.name: font_title
field.label: Font for your title
field.description: The font with an * are safe fonts. No need to load an extra font file on your website and support all special characters.

field.name: custom_font_title
field.label: New Google font for your title
field.description: Copy the code of your Google font. More details in the manual.

field.name: font_size_title
field.label: Font size of your title in px or %

field.name: font_text
field.label: Font for your text
field.description: The font with an * are safe fonts. No need to load an extra font file on your website and support all special characters.

field.name: custom_font_text
field.label: New Google font for your text
field.description: Copy the code of your Google font. More details in the manual.

field.label: Font size of your text in px or %
